root.name: Butcher Hill
root.description: Intelligence reports indicate that POWs are being held at a guerilla outpost on Butcher Hill and being a one man army you decide to free them.The game is split into three different sections.1 - The first section is vertical scrolling zodiac ride, where you must avoid obstacles like rocks and mines while collecting ammo.2 - After you've successful landed you boat at the jetty it's time for a walk through the jungle. You must be careful though because the jungle is crawling with enemy patrols and also has mines throughout.3 - The last section takes place at Butcher Hill. Take out the camp with everything you have while looking out for enemy soldiers.
